tests.name: self join - two streams - with both join column in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM R (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM L INNER JOIN R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON L.A = R.A;

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: L_A INT KEY, L_B INT, L_C INT, R_A INT, R_B INT, R_C INT

tests.name: self join - two streams - with left join column in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM R (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT L.*, R.* FROM L INNER JOIN R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON L.A = ABS(R.A);

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: L_A INT KEY, L_B INT, L_C INT, R_A INT, R_B INT, R_C INT

tests.name: self join - two streams - with right join column in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM R (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT L.*, R.* FROM L INNER JOIN R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON ABS(L.A) = R.A;

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: R_A INT KEY, L_A INT, L_B INT, L_C INT, R_B INT, R_C INT

tests.name: self join - two streams - with only right join column in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM R (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT L.B, L.C, R.* FROM L INNER JOIN R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON L.A = R.A;

sources.name: OUTPUT

tests.name: self join - two streams - full outer - with both join column in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM R (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM L FULL OUTER JOIN R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON L.A = R.A;

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: ROWKEY INT KEY, L_A INT, L_B INT, L_C INT, R_A INT, R_B INT, R_C INT

tests.name: self join - two streams - left outer - with both join column in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM R (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM L LEFT JOIN R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON L.A = R.A;

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: L_A INT KEY, L_B INT, L_C INT, R_A INT, R_B INT, R_C INT

tests.name: self join - two streams - missing join columns in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM R (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT l.B, l.C, R.B, R.C FROM L INNER JOIN R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON L.A = R.A;

expectedException.message: The query used to build `OUTPUT` must include the join expressions L.A or R.A in its projection (eg, SELECT L.A...).

tests.name: self join - two streams - missing synthetic join column in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM R (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT l.*, r.* FROM L INNER JOIN R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON ABS(L.A) = ABS(R.A);

expectedException.message:
Key missing from projection (ie, SELECT). See https://cnfl.io/2LV7ouS.
The query used to build `OUTPUT` must include the join expression ROWKEY in its projection (eg, SELECT ROWKEY...).
ROWKEY was added as a synthetic key column because the join criteria did not match any source column. This expression must be included in the projection and may be aliased.

tests.name: self join - with both join column in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM L INNER JOIN L AS R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON L.A = R.A;

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: L_A INT KEY, L_B INT, L_C INT, R_A INT, R_B INT, R_C INT

tests.name: self join - missing synthetic join column in projection
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT l.*, r.* FROM L INNER JOIN L AS R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON ABS(L.A) = ABS(R.A);

expectedException.message:
Key missing from projection (ie, SELECT). See https://cnfl.io/2LV7ouS.
The query used to build `OUTPUT` must include the join expression ROWKEY in its projection (eg, SELECT ROWKEY...).
ROWKEY was added as a synthetic key column because the join criteria did not match any source column. This expression must be included in the projection and may be aliased.

tests.name: stream stream self join with stars and duplicates
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT L.*, L.B AS LB_2, R.*, R.C AS RC_2 FROM L INNER JOIN L AS R WITHIN 10 SECONDS GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON L.A = R.A;

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: L_A INT KEY, L_B INT, L_C INT, LB_2  INT, R_A INT, R_B INT, R_C INT, RC_2 INT

tests.name: stream stream self join with different before and after windows
statements: CREATE STREAM L (A INT KEY, B INT, C INT) WITH (kafka_topic='LEFT', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT L.A, L.B, L.C, R.B, R.C FROM L INNER JOIN L AS R WITHIN (11 seconds, 10 seconds) GRACE PERIOD 1 minute ON L.A = R.A;

sources.name: OUTPUT
sources.schema: L_A INT KEY, L_B INT, L_C INT, R_B INT, R_C INT

tests.name: stream stream self join with out of order and custom grace period
